title: The Welsh-mens glory, or, the famous victories of the ancient Britains obtain'd upon St. David's day
publisher: printed by Th. Dawks, his Majesties British printer, at the West-end of Thames-street,
notes: Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
